item.title: CVE-2024-35643|2024-06-03T06:50:06.532Z -- Xabier Miranda -- WP Back Button
item.description: Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Xabier Miranda WP Back Button allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Back Button: from n/a through 1.1.3.
